data.why:
I have been using Perl for more than 10 years. I will upload some
    tiny tools that I made in the past. Of course, I will keep making
    Perl modules in the future.

    By the way, I have reported on the problem of Unicode::MapUTF8 to
    CPAN once before.

    http://search.cpan.org/src/SNOWHARE/Unicode-MapUTF8-1.11/Changes

    <masahiro.honma@tsutaya.co.jp> is me.
